article: surging crowds and sharpening barbs preceded the climax of the new hampshire primary campaign , as democrat barack obama sought to hand hillary rodham clinton her second defeat while republican mitt romney worked furiously to avoid one himself .
abstract: crowds barbs mark final stage of new hampshire primary campaign in white house race
